First Nonparametric UC3M Workshop

A workshop based on monographic seminars in Nonparametric Statistics held in the Department of Statistics of the Carlos III University of Madrid.

View the Project on GitHub

Scope

Conferences and discussions with some of the current leading experts in Nonparametric Statistics, held in the Department of Statistics of Carlos III University of Madrid.


The Department of Statistics at UC3M (Getafe)


Speakers

Speaker Looks like? Affiliation Date Topic
Davide La Vecchia Université of Genéve Friday 3rd TBA
Thomas Verdebout Université libre de Bruxelles Wednesday 8th TBA
Jacobo de Uña Universidad de Vigo Friday 10th TBA

Eustasio del Barrio Universidad de Valladolid Wednesday 22th TBA
Ricardo Fraiman Universidad de la República Friday 24th TBA

Location

Seminars to be held in Sala Costas Goutis 10.0.23 (Getafe) at 13:00. It is located at the ground floor of building 10 (Campomanes). The exact coordinates are given in the map below.


Organization

  • Scientific comittee: Antonio Cuevas, Marc Hallin, and Daniel Peña.
  • Organizing comittee: Eduardo García Portugués, Raúl Jiménez Recaredo (chair) and Susana Linares (secretary).

Contact

In case of questions you may contact slinares@pa.uc3m.es or edgarcia@est-econ.uc3m.es.
